entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:48 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
